titleStmt.title: Tećhnepolimogamia: or, The marriage of armes and arts, July 12. 1651. Being an accompt of the act at Oxon. to a friend. / By R. W.
titleStmt.author: Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is transliterated from the Greek.
Identified as Wing W79 on UMI microfilm set "Early English Books, 1641-1700" reel 1940.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Bodleian Library, Oxford ("Early English Books, 1641-1700" reel 1940.
